DOC.brief_summary: Glucosamine sulphate causes no changes in blood levels of cholesterol
DOC.brief_title: Glucosamine Sulphate and Increased Level of Blood Cholesterol
DOC.detailed_description: The effects on glucosamine sulphate on blood levels of choleterol is measuered in patients with mild to moderate osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Osteoarthritic pain, normal blood cholesterol levels Systemic diseases, pregnancy, need of medication besides painkillers
